issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

relatedNodes.html: Â© Copyright 2009 COL Group, Indiana University Web design released by Flash Gallery

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.31 (foreground color: #ff6600, background color: #444444, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
